elements.title: unit fractions
elements.contents: ... that exercises in the fair division of food (example pictured) are often used to teach unit fractions?

elements.title: Magic Slates
elements.contents: ... that US embassy staff in Moscow during the Cold War used Magic Slates to stop the KGB from intercepting their communications?

elements.title: Star Control
elements.contents: ... that the creators of the 1990 game Star Control designed a starship for an alien race of female humanoids, naming it the Penetrator for its resemblance to a ribbed condom?

elements.title: Ilona Tóth
elements.contents: ... that Ilona Tóth testified that she had injected a man with gasoline?

elements.title: The 1619 Project
elements.contents: ... that "Fear", an episode of The 1619 Project, traces present-day vigilante violence against Black youths in the United States to the fear of slave rebellions?

elements.title: Muhammad Saleh Arifin
elements.contents: ... that as mayor, Muhammad Saleh Arifin permitted a temporary gambling area in Medan, Indonesia, saying that it would fund a new street?

elements.title: Friedrichshafen FF.1
elements.contents: ... that there was only one Friedrichshafen FF.1 aircraft and it was destroyed in a crash?

elements.title: Mardijo
elements.contents: ... that Mardijo was sentenced to one, then two, then one, then two years in prison?
